Uses of Class
xxl.core.functions.AbstractFunction

  • Packages that use AbstractFunction 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.queues.io
    The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.
    xxl.core.functions
    Functions are an extremely important concept to encapsulate abstractions.
    xxl.core.functions.concrete
    Contains concrete implementations of functions which where used by XXL built-in class e.g. builder classes.
    xxl.core.math.functions
    The package xxl.core.math.functions contains necessary classes and interfaces to work with real-valued functions.
    xxl.core.math.numerics.splines
    The package xxl.core.math.numerics.splines computes a cubic Bezier-Spline interpolation with one of the two common boundary conditions for a one-dimensional real-valued function by determining the necessary parameters.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric provides several methods based on nonparametric statistics.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.collections.queues.io

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.collections.queues.io 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RandomAccessFileQueue.InputStreamFactory
      A function that opens an input stream for reading the serialized elements of the queue and returns it.
      class  RandomAccessFileQueue.OutputStreamFactory
      A function that opens an output stream for writing serialized elements to the queue and returns it.

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.functions

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.functions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMetaDataFunction<P,R,M>
      An abstract implementation of the interface MetaDataFunction that extends the class AbstractFunction.
      class  ArrayFactory<T>
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by Functional.ArrayFactory
      class  Constant<T>
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by Functional.UnaryFunction
      class  DecoratorArrayFunction<P,R>
      A DecoratorArrayFunction invokes each function given to the constructor on the given parameters when calling the invoke method.
      class  FastMapProjection<T>
      This class provides a projection from any object-space with a given distance function to a k-dimensional real valued metric space (using the euklidean distance function, also known as L2-Metric) using the FastMap algorithm.
      static class  For.IntegerIncrement
      This class provides a Function that expects an Integer-Object as its input and returns the increment.
      class  Identity<T>
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by Functional.Identity
      class  Iff<P,R>
      Deprecated. 
      replaced by Functional.Iff
      class  MultiPrint<T>
      The MultiPrint-Function prints arguments to a specified print stream and returns them.
      class  NTuplify
      A binary function that creates a tuple represented as an Object[].
      class  PredicateFunction<P>
      Provides a wrapper for Predicates to Functions.
      class  Print<T>
      The Print-Function prints arguments to a specified print stream and returns them.
      class  Projection<T>
      An object of this class projects an input array-argument to a "sub"-array of arguments.
      class  Switch<I,R>
      This class provides a functional switch statement.
      class  Tuplify
      Maps the arguments to a tuple (=Object[]).

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.functions.concrete

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.functions.concrete 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PrimitivesGetKeyFunction
      Functional programming style lambda function to extract the key of a given tuple.
      class  TupleGetKeyFunction<Tuple,ColumnComparableTuple>
      Functional programming style lambda function to extract the key of a given tuple.

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.functions

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.functions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRealFunctionFunction
      This class provides a skeletal implementation for classes extending Function and also implementing RealFunction.
      class  AggregationFunctionFunction<A,P extends A>
      This class wraps an aggregation-function to a normal function.
      class  LinearCombination
      This class provides a linear combination of two given RealFunctions as a RealFunction.
      class  RealFunctionFunction
      This class provides a wrapper for objects of type RealFunction for using them as Function.

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.numerics.splines

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.numerics.splines 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CubicBezierSpline
      This class implements a cubic Bezier-Spline interpolation with one of the two common boundary conditions for a one-dimensional real-valued function by determining the necessary parameters.
      class  RB1CubicBezierSpline
      This class implements a cubic Bezier-Spline with the first boundary condition.
      class  RB2CubicBezierSpline
      This class implements a cubic Bezier-Spline with the second boundary condition.

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmpiricalCDF
      This class realizes a real-valued function providing an empirical cdf (cumulative distribution function) based on a simple random sample (iid) for data given by objects of type Number.

    • Uses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels

      Subclasses of AbstractFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractKernelCDF
      One main problem of nonparametric statistics is the estimation of the probability density function (pdf) of a random variable.
      class  AbstractKernelDensityEstimator
      One main problem of nonparametric statistics is the estimation of the probability density function (pdf) of a random variable.
      class  AdaBandKernelDensityEstimatorND
      This class provides a native implementation of a n-dimensional kernel based density estimator based upon a sample of data given by objects of type double [].
      class  DifferenceKernelEstimator
      This class provides a difference kernel estimator (dke).
      class  HybridKernelCDF
      This class provides an implementation of a kernel based estimator for a cumulative distribution function (cdf).
      class  HybridKernelDensityEstimator
      This class provides an implementation of a kernel based density estimator based upon a simple random sample for data given by objects of type Number.
      class  NativeKernelCDF
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  NativeKernelDensityEstimator
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  ReflectionKernelCDF
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects.
      class  ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator
      This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects.
